Energy, essence, soul, Unformed into a body. It is time to become part of the world. It's all up to you...
You are a animal a creature ruled by insticts but you have awoken with a senitent mind, able to think and plan. Your fate shall be decided by your actions alone, all want to survive, but there are so many ways, so many forms, so many diverging paths...Who's eyes do you see through

You mane is full and a deep umber shade, ears poking out of it.

The Airport, Cut off escape, and retailiation
111.content:
Food, THe enternal currency, all are born with it, and the strong claim the most thats you! You have eaten out the small villiages and your
belly just feels to lose, you want to feast, revel in ultimate hunger.You know of cities, you can smell the mass of humanity, it's addictive to eat them, thankfully they repopulate fast. Massive and hungry, your presence always sends the humans scattering, a worthy show of respect... if they are fast enough, no need to try not to step on one. a few cars slip between your legs in a race away from the big city, smart and brave, those humans should breed, you'll eat the weaker ones. the ones going back to the city, your cornicopia of sustinance. thosands of times more than a simple villiage. Not being just off the savana you know humans flee in many ways, first stop is to crack the way out as best a lion can. You stomp up the road as you move, picking up cars and eating ones that seem full, smashing the ones with more metal than flesh under your footpaw. so what to next
111.title: Closing the noose on your feast.

choices: The TV broadcasting Building, give the world a look at you
Find the biggest stadium you can find, and watch the events
114.content: It has been a long time since you have had more out of life than pigging out, your belly swells a bit from the last villiage you entered into your directory. It got so simple, they hardly put up a fight when you were viewed as their god. It's time to get a fresh place to find the sweet aura of fear. Yeah, You want to see them plead and wiggle. You want them to gasp when you grunt and burp. You want no more of this "Thank you lord for eating my family" after you belch up a few old shoes. With that you give small boulder a kick, sending it miles away. At 100 feet tall you have a tendency to cause damage when you are in a funk. And thats how you get out of one. In the distance you see buildings, real ones, not flimsy huts. The big city is ahead of you. You murr in pleasure, so much to do, if you remember right the last one had enough to keep you busy for days, it's a lion ammusment park.. why haven't you been to more you wonder to yourself. Aww maybe you just fell loyal to the tribesmen somehow, God work just kinda makes playing in sheer bliss hard to find the time for. Well this is your chance to revel, where to first?
114.title: All Work and No Play

choices: All you can eat!
Lots of toys to play with
1141.content:
You stomp your way into the city, crushing countless people, cars and houses under your mighty paw. These sensations stimulate you, making you itch at your crotch the whole walk there. You soon reach downtown, now sticking to the streets since these buildings are taller and harder to crush underfoot.

The city is in chaos at your arrival: helicopters flying around you, cars desperately trying to get in front of one another in traffic, the streets flooding with those trying to escape; but not before they meet their demise under your weight.

You see a huge antenna, assuming that's the news tower, and get close to the building. It's large compared to the others, and manages to be as tall as you are. You can tell the cameras are on you, and you make sure to show your muscled arms, belly round from eating people in the past, and your endowments. Now, only showing isn't any good. How about you show them your power...
1141.title: The TV broadcasting Building, give the world a ...

1142.content: You arrive to see the end of the game your favorite team the lions have lost 2-1 you hear the crowed chearing for the other team. The lion grow angery he kicks a few cars to block the exits and lets out a giant roar over the vast stadium. People started to panic and there was a mad rush to get to the exit which thay found blocked the lion looked down. They looked like ants franticly trying to escape a trap, Ants which the lion felt need to be extermanated. The lion leaned his weight and swang one massive paw over the stadium, the lions paw was a bit smaller then the pitch. The lion lowerd his paw on the panicing people the screams grow louder as people tryed to escape the decending paw. The paw seattle gently on the less fortuent people, you feel there wiggles under you paw, it fells good you add on the pressure you fell the warm bubbleing of blood and then the cold earth as your paw sinks deep into the pitch, You lifted you paw and held it in the air intil more people were pushed into the shadow.

The terrified camera man was nearly doubling over in fright, as he frantically looked around for a way out! He sees no way out of his fur lined "arena".

You growl at the camera man, and then look down at your twitching member, showing him what you want him to do.

The man understands, but obviously doesn't want to. After you roar, and show him your teeth, he decides he'd much rather live, which would be ore likely if you did what he wants. He walks up to your furry orbs, and starts rubbing. Meanwhile, the camera's recording all of it...

131.content: A massive fem Roo who stands at a healthy 40 foot tall is a sight, easily making the largest of impressions on this town. Your sauntering approach is unhurried, most of the townsfolk have a natural common sense to remain hidden. A few sniffs in the air, and your rewarded by a cornicopia of scents, craneing your head you notice a thigh high sign on a likewise sized fence, reading slowly it states "City Zoo" Leaning over and Putting your right paw on the sign you give a wide eyed smile to a vendor outside the gate, he is petrified. Holding up something timidly at you, a tiny plush roo. You look past the gates to a chaotic afair inside. Your belly rumbles a little as you pat it with your other free forpaw paw, so many options, so little... well. there is actually quiet a bit of time you think

13111.content: You take the small plush roo and inspect it, then stare back at him as he turns around petrified, you squeese the little animal till it's head pops off and it's body is turned to stuffing "You think thats a good immitation of me?" you snarl, eyes of fire staring into the mans soul as he shivers "p..pleeeasssee.. don't do anything to me, I was making a honest gesture." You snarl and stamp your foot next to him "Tough!" you bend over and snag him with a paw "I think you were trying to insult me! You squeeze him a little, making him go blue as you snarl "And thats going to cost you" you toss him into the air and let him land on your snout "Think your pretty big making fake roos, only roos can make roos" You snarl and snake your tongue around the struggling merchents belly, and drag him into your wet sloopy jaws screaming. You taste his fear, it's delicious, your tongue slides over his body, feeling his sweat as you slosh him around casually in your mouth, rubbing his hair against your soft inner mouth. A few mintutes of sloshing him around your gums and teeth you puff your cheaks and make a big swallow, sending him sailing, screaming into your belly as you smile broadly, sniffing at his cart with disdane before stomping it into the cement. Now that that little bugger is settled you set your eyes on the "ZOo" you see humans streaming out...

That wasn't exactly the impression you had in mind. You watch as another human, a young adult male has stoped in front of you, taking out a posterboard and a paint set you focus on him, watching intently as a few humans sneak through your legs. the human is painting you, still not noticing your a living breathing roo. after ten minutes or so he looks up, looks down and puts both hands up to you and starts to plead for your mercy. You bend over and snif at the little man, "Why thank you" you watch him almost faint, luckily you catch him "it's nice to see someone understands a girl like me." He looks into your eyes and then down at your ample stomach as you use one paw to lift it open "Don't worry precious, I wont hurt you," He seems to have mixed reactions as you drop him into your soft warm furred home that pulls nice and tight around him "There you go, such a nice little person"

143.content:
"Yes! The city" you think... "it's time to show these bugs where they belong"

You lick over your lips and murr as you think about the feast you will have soon and leave your large cave, heading for the town.

info.brief_description: Macro and Vore, will the story be gentle or ruthless?
info.description:
My first true try at a interactive story, seems like a very fun concept, if it's well recived expect more of the same with difrent characters. Please add chapters when you read it, there are plenty of places for everyone to contribute.

Choose a character, and your off, (First person to chose a species please put in both a pred and prey link at the bottom, sizes can vary, would also be nice for using the maxium number of paths the first couple levels to allow more branchings later.

The characters used are generic with no names, so no brining in named characters from my other work, ok?
